EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Signup
EmailTemplate.subject: How to Sign Up for Our Live Webinars
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We’re excited to offer live webinars that can help you get the most out of your Luxury Presence services!
Click here to see our available webinars: https://luxurypresence.my.site.com/helpcenter/s/article/Sign-Up-for-Live-Classes
These webinars cover a range of topics designed to enhance your experience, from best practices for managing your site to mastering marketing tools.
If you have any questions or need help signing up, don’t hesitate to reach out to our Support Team.
Looking forward to seeing you in class!
Best regards, {!User.FirstName} Luxury Presence Support (310) 955-1077 support@luxurypresence.com
